data.text:
My husband and I had a fantastic stay at Island Blue - on our 
our very much belated Honeymoon. The staff were very helpful, check in was super easy, the hotel is located within perfect reach to the main area of Pefkos and the beach (which we frequented often). Breakfast, which was included, was great and we were able to get a table each morning. The rooms were clean, comfy and very spacious. 
We have recommended Island Blue to all of our family and friends, and we are planning to return next year :)
data.title: Amazing stay & will be returning!

data.text: 4 of us stayed here for 3 weeks. Room was immaculate when we arrived but then after that room cleaning wasn’t very good. We didn’t complain as other things made up for it. We loved Kostas at the island blue bar & Nikos & Michaela at swim up bar. We went to swim up bar most days cos of these 2. We didn’t eat in Greek or Italian restaurant but had snacks during the day which were lovely especially the pizza. Hotel is in a great location.
data.title: Lovely hotel!

user_location.name: Newcastle upon Tyne, Tyne and Wear, England

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests 

Thank you for taking the time to write your review of your stay with us here at the Island Blue hotel. I am happy to hear that you chose us for your stay  here in Pefkos for your 3 week holiday.

Thank you for all your  comments  which are very much appreciated and will of course be passed onto the various departments . Its unusual for us to hear about the cleaning situation and i only wish you had mentioned it to the reception during your stay so that we could have sorted this for you. Hopefully next time you will have chnace to visit our Italian and Greek Tavernas.

We look forward to being able to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future for another great stay with us and many more happy memories.. 

Kind regards

 Xenofon Asprakis - General Manager
owner_response.author: Panagiotis Ioannidis

data.text: Visited Pefkos and Island Blue at the beginning of October.  We found it such  a lovely Hotel.  The rooms were spacious and cleaned daily.  A good choice at breakfast and all the staff were friendly, extremely polite and helpful. Couldn’t fault anything and definitely recommend.
data.title: Fabulous Hotel

data.text: Just returned from Island Blue hotel, the whole complex is fantastic, location to the beach 5 mins away & a short stroll into the centre. Stayed in Lindia Thalassa last year which was also lovely. the care & attention given by all staff across the board is exceptional. The grounds are so well manicured, alot of care & attention paid. We stayed B&B, plenty of choice for all tastes. The room was really spacious with a huge terrace. It was my birthday while we stayed & I received a lovely cake & wine which was very thoughtful, thank you. We love it here & have already booked for next year!
data.title: Highly Recommend!

Thank you for all your  comments  which are very much appreciated and will of course be passed onto the various departments and staff  =- its always great for the staff to hear great feedback. 

We look forward to being able to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future for another great stay with us and many more happy memories..

owner_response.author: Panagiotis Ioannidis

data.text:
I’m not sure where to start on how great this hotel is. The staff are first most exceptional, so professional and friendly. This hotel is very loved and cared for and it shows. The room was lovely it over looked the pool/pool bar area. The room was large with a large bed. Lovely and spacious. Bathroom was equally as nice as the room all modern. The room has a lovely balcony with space to hang out clothes to dry. The pools at island blue were spacious and clean with plenty of sunbeds with umbrellas. The pool bar was such a nice touch the food was actually incredible such a treat to have and plenty of drinks with lovely staff Kostas. 
I used the spa for a massage which I would highly recommend and rate and got my hair done also that was a lovely experience but I guess my only complaint would be that the staff all know English but choose to speak in Greek when you are having treatments which I just found a slightly inconsiderate other than that my hair was revived for my travels home. 
The breakfast each morning was standard and does not change, there is something for everyone for sure. 
If we are ever to return to Rhodes, Pefkos I would be certain to return to this hotel it was stunning and over all just perfect for what you need a holiday!
data.title: The hotel with everything!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests 

Thank you for taking the time to write your review of your stay with us here at the Island Blue hotel. I am happy to hear that you chose us for your stay  here in Pefkos for your holiday.

Thank you for all your  comments  which are very much appreciated and will of course be passed onto the various departments .  Thank you also for your feedback about the spa and the breakfast which we will raise with the department managers to review.

We look forward to being able to welcome you back to the hotel in the near future for another great stay with us and many more happy memories.. 

Kind regards

 Xenofon Asprakis - General Manager
